original: KABLBEBG, Josef Kaleb, Direktör, Gökalund, f Söderåkra 6/11 82 av sjökapt P Carlsson o Anna Lindberg, gm Karin Thornell. Folksk. Anst Lorentz Petersons Trävaruaff Bergkvara 99—05, Smith, Hogg & Co Ltd, West Hartlepool Engl, 05—07, Fr Göttsche, Flensburg Tyskl, 08—09, Bruno Schaps, Hamburg, 10. Eg vksmh sed. 11, ag AB J Karlberg Gökalund o AB Bergkvara Träindustri Bergkvara, styr.led dsa. Komm- o municip.flm. Resor i Bur fi länd. Av trycket: »Praktisk Snabb-räkningstabell». Frimurare. Hobbies: Segling, arbete.
translated:
KABLBEBG, Josef Kaleb, Director, Gökalund, b. Söderåkra 6/11 1882, son of sea captain P Carlsson and Anna Lindberg, married to Karin Thornell. Educated at Lorentz Peterson's Elementary School, Bergkvara 1899—1905, worked at Smith, Hogg & Co Ltd, West Hartlepool, England 1905—1907, Fr Göttsche, Flensburg, Germany 1908—1909, Bruno Schaps, Hamburg, 1910. Started my own business in 1911, AG J Karlberg, Gökalund, and AB Bergkvara Träindustri, Bergkvara, serving on various boards and committees. Traveled extensively in Europe. Authored the publication "Praktisk Snabb-räkningstabell" (Practical Quick Calculation Table). Freemason. Hobbies include sailing and work. 

Note: 'm. partners name' indicates that the person married in the year 19xx.

structured.name: Josef Kaleb
structured.description: Director, Freemason, and author of 'Praktisk Snabb-räkningstabell'. Josef Kaleb was born on November 6, 1882, in Söderåkra, Sweden. He was the son of sea captain P Carlsson and Anna Lindberg. Josef married Karin Thornell in 19XX. He attended Lorentz Peterson's Elementary School in Bergkvara from 1899 to 1905. Throughout his career, Josef worked at several organizations, including Smith, Hogg & Co Ltd in West Hartlepool, England (1905-1907), Fr Göttsche in Flensburg, Germany (1908-1909), Bruno Schaps in Hamburg (1910), and also started his own business, AG J Karlberg in Gökalund, from 1911. He served on various boards and committees, and was particularly involved in dsa, a government organization. Apart from his professional life, Josef enjoyed sailing and work. More information about Josef Kaleb can be found on his Wikipedia page.
